typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TotalCost as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		OrderDetailID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		UpdatedDate as string,
		SourceSystemID as string,
		GlobelOrderID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> Sales
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string,
		AddressID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		SourceSystemID as string,
		GlobalCustomerID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Customer
Customer filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Filter1
